tribes_toporzol_info.English: The Hordes of Toporzol are tribes from the wastelands unified under the rule of dark witches. They believe in quantity over quality.

tribes_toporzol_info2.English: The Toporzol can swarm the Square with its weak spearmen. These units do not need to depend on their cities's population. Additionally, has access to dark magic.

tooltip_ability_altarsurvive.English: This unit is not sacrificed upon stepping on the altar, instead it gets blessed, increasing their max health.

tooltip_ability_swarmcalling.English: Can call a spearmen in each of your cities (excluding sieged ones), then receive a max health bonus equal to the number of called spearmen. Has a 3-turn cooldown globally.

tooltip_ability_transforminto.English: This unit can learn to become a Shaman of the Swarm (super unit) on the altar for 15 stars.

tooltip_ability_healasgo.English: This unit heals 2 health after each move.

spearmanjoin_description.English: A spearman from a nearby primitive clan appeared in your capital!

tooltip_ability_toporzolcurse.English: This unit can curse enemy units, reducing their strength to 1 until their next attack.

tooltip_ability_darkwizard.English: Upon attacking an enemy unit, gain 1 star.

building_ability_altardesc.English: The first Toporzolian unit stepping on this altar on this turn is immediately sacrificed. Receive score and population if the unit had 10 or more health.

building_ability_swarmcalldesc.English: Units with the Swarmcalling ability may train a spearman in every one of your cities (excluding sieged ones) with the blow of a horn.

building_ability_shamantransdesc.English: Units with the Student ability may transform themselves into a Shaman of the Swarm (super unit) on altars for 15 stars.
